payment_errors.deferred_date_changed: Your payment could not be processed because the pending payment date has changed. Please review your order and try again.

marketing.accept_marketing_checkbox_label: Receive news and offers via email

unsubscribe.title: You have signed out
unsubscribe.description: You will no longer receive shopping cart reminders from us.

marketing.accept_sms_checkbox_label: Receive news and offers via text message

disclaimer.description_html: If you sign up to receive text messages, you will receive recurring automated marketing messages, including shopping cart reminders, via the phone number provided. Consent is not a condition of purchase. Respond with the word STOP to unsubscribe. Reply with the word HELP to request assistance. Message frequency varies. Message and data usage fees may apply. Check out our %{privacy_policy_link} and %{terms_of_service_link}.
disclaimer.description_transactional_html: We'll text you an order receipt and recurring shipping updates. Reply with the word STOP to unsubscribe. Reply with the word HELP to request assistance. Message frequency varies. Message and data usage fees may apply. Check out our %{privacy_policy_modal_link} and %{terms_of_service_modal_link}.
